SELECT ba.`activity_id`, ba.`venue_id`, (select venue_name from b_venue_info bvi where bvi.venue_id = ba.venue_id) as venueName, ba.`uid`, (select uname from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = ba.`uid`) as userName, ba.`activity_id_name`, ba.`activity_count`, ba.`activity_type`, ba.`activity_content`, ba.`activity_icon_url`, ba.`status`, ba.`activity_time`, ba.`create_time`, ba.`update_time` FROM b_activities ba
and exists (select 1 from b_venue_info bvi where bvi.`venue_id` = ba.`venue_id` and bvi.venue_name like concat('%',#{cgName},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = ba.`uid` and bu1.uname like concat('%',#{yyrName},'%'))
and ba.`activity_id_name` like concat('%',#{acName},'%')
and ba.`status` = #{aStatus}
and ba.`activity_id` = #{activityId}
ORDER BY ba.activity_id DESC
